statements: DELETE FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1 AND security_level > 5;
DELETE FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john.doe' AND password_hash = 'hashed_password';
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 1 AND success = true;
DELETE FROM users WHERE id IN (5, 8);
DELETE FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 200 AND login_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 100 AND logout_time IS NULL;
DELETE FROM password_history WHERE user_id = 101 AND change_time < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM user_sessions WHERE session_id IN (SELECT session_id FROM user_sessions WHERE logout_time IS NOT NULL) AND login_time < '2022-11-01';
